```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(XML)
library(tidyverse)

u <- "/home/yincy/git/Data/R/XML/List of countries and dependencies by population - Wikipedia.html"
tabls <- readHTMLTable(u)

tabls %>% lapply(nrow)
pop <- readHTMLTable(u, which = 1)
```
